In England, in the seven days to 24 March, there were 31,516 new confirmed cases (56.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 March, there were 32,151 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (635 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 March is 3,794,011 (6,740.5 cases per 100,000 population).
